Once I've treated a couple of wealthy widows, the word will spread quickly. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Heart aspect cards are often useful when running a Sanatorium.]
Run a Sanatorium or a Doctor's Practice?
I'll need an Office to run a Doctor's Practice, or a large, but also an impressive venue to run a Sanatorium. A warehouse or other unattractive space won't cut it.

My treatments may not be quite what they seem... but my results are always excellent. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Heart aspect cards are often useful when running a Practice.]
I can bring genuine healing miracles to a congregation. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Moth aspect cards are often useful when running a Cult.]
Assemble an Esoteric Cult of the Flowermaker

The Flowermaker's presence is strong here. I'll let the enthusiasts in the congregation pursue their pleasures. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Moth aspect cards are often useful when running a Cult.]
Assemble an Esoteric Cult of the Horned Axe

The Horned-Axe's presence is strong here. Some of the congregation will be drawn to her. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Moth aspect cards are often useful when running a Cult.]
Assemble an Esoteric Cult of the Wolf Divided

The Wolf Divided's presence is strong here. The more violent members of the congregation will respond to that. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Moth aspect cards are often useful when running a Cult.]
Everyone's happy. The show must go on. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash. Moth aspect cards are often useful when running a Cult.]
And everything's legal. So legal it's a little unnerving. [A reasonably safe way to generate cash. Lantern aspect cards are often useful when running an Import Business.]
As long as I have the connections and the resources, I can... make money. [A reasonably safe way to generate cash. Forge aspect cards are often useful when running a Counterfeiting Operation.]

Everything's valuable somewhere. [A reasonably safe way to generate cash. Smuggling operations are generally Subtle, but pay well anyway. Moth aspect cards are often useful when running a  Smuggling Operation.]

Nasty. But as long as I keep some years on hand, I shouldn't suffer too much permanent damage. [Any failed challenges will result in a Wound, which you won't be able to heal until the Operation is complete. Edge aspect cards are often useful when competing in Illegal Fights.]
[Add Forge 6 and Space to begin a counterfeiting operation, a Seaport Opportunity and Space to begin a smuggling operation, or a Stolen Year to compete in illegal fights.]

This has been a century for revolutions, and it's hardly begun. I'll be saving lives [There will be an opportunity for profit, and you'll win favour with the local authorities. The Colonel likes the status quo.]

It'll be messy, but it might even make the world a better place, eventually. [There will be an opportunity for profit; and it'll be harder for the reckoners to pick up your trail. The Lionsmith likes rebellions.]

There's nothing a ruler wants more than more life, and there's no-one who pays better. I'll need to make sure my patron doesn't understand my methods, though, or they might get ideas. [A reasonably safe way to convert stolen lifespan into cash.]
